pages.text: A demonic shield infused with will. Has 4x the durability of a normal shield (1344 vs 336) and grants special effects when blocking based on the type of demon will available.

pages.title: Will Effects
pages.text: $(bold)Raw Will:$() Standard blocking$(br2)$(bold)Steadfast:$() Increased knockback resistance$(br2)$(bold)Corrosive:$() Attackers take damage$(br2)$(bold)Vengeful:$() Reflect damage back$(br2)The shield automatically detects your highest will type and adapts accordingly.

pages.title: Will Bonus
pages.text: $(bold)Will Gain:$() +30% demon will gained while equipped$(br2)The Sentient Shield increases the amount of will you gain from all sources while it is in your main or offhand. Perfect for will farming!$(br2)$(italic)A shield that hungers for more.$()
